bullets_en: Engineered an introductory Python curriculum tailored for early learners (grade 5-7), translating core programming concepts, such as sequential logic, loops, and conditional branching, into highly simplified, interactive learning modules.
Lead VEX IQ coaching sessions focused on mechanical logic and iterative problem-solving, guiding students through the design and debugging of modular robotic systems.
Developed specialized coding exercises and assessments that emphasize clean code principles, helping students transition from basic syntax to building functional project portfolios.
bullets_zh: 为早期学习者（5–7 年级）设计入门级 Python 课程，将顺序逻辑、循环和条件分支等核心编程概念转化为高度简化的交互式学习模块。
负责 VEX IQ 指导课程，专注于机械逻辑与迭代式问题解决，指导学生设计和调试模块化机器人系统。
开发了专门的编码练习和评估，强调代码整洁原则，帮助学生从基础语法过渡到构建可运行的项目作品集。

bullets_en: Developed core features for Joule AI Assistant using Python and GPT-5. Modernized CI/CD for Joule by architecting a modular GitHub Actions pipeline with Project Piper and Kyma, and automated end-to-end deployment via ArgoCD, eliminating manual synchronization errors.

Implemented an end-to-end testing strategy for Joule and Codengine by building a dual-layer testing suite with Cucumber and Pytest. Maintained ~90% integration and ~95% unit test coverage each sprint and automated daily reporting through a Jenkins pipeline.

Engineered an LLM-powered data pipeline using Python and GPT-5 to categorize partner questions and extract qualitative trends, enabling product managers to prioritize and address top concerns across 7 SAP partners.

Built a centralized Flask-based RESTful API to orchestrate 50+ IoT devices (OrionStar robots), transitioning showroom operations from manual control to an automated system for synchronized international demonstrations.
bullets_zh: 使用 Python 与 GPT-5 开发 Joule AI 助手的核心功能。通过构建模块化的 GitHub Actions 管道（集成 Project Piper 与 Kyma）并使用 ArgoCD 自动化端到端部署，现代化了 Joule 的 CI/CD，消除了手动同步错误。
为 Joule 和 Codengine 实施端到端测试策略，构建了基于 Cucumber 与 Pytest 的双层测试套件。每个冲刺保持约 90% 的集成测试覆盖率与约 95% 的单元测试覆盖率，并通过 Jenkins 管道自动生成每日报告。
使用 Python 与 GPT-5 构建了基于 LLM 的数据管道，用于对合作伙伴问题进行分类并提取定性趋势，帮助产品经理在 7 个 SAP 合作伙伴中优先处理和解决主要问题。
构建了一个基于 Flask 的集中式 RESTful API 用于协调 50+ 台物联网设备（OrionStar 机器人），将展厅操作从手动控制转为自动化系统以进行同步的国际演示。

bullets_en: Architected an automated Divide, Conquer, Recheck (DCR) pipeline using Python and GPT4o to extract structured numerical data from 60+ scientific publications; achieved 88% accuracy across 1,464 data points, automating a previously manual research process. (View Code)

Developed an interactive React dashboard for the University of Toronto’s City Digital Twin Project, integrating GraphDB via SPARQL to visualize stratified urban data through map-based indicators and multi-dimensional charts to facilitate complete community analysis and data-driven urban planning. (View Code)
bullets_zh: 使用 Python 与 GPT4o 构建自动化的“划分-征服-复核（DCR）”管道，从 60+ 篇科学出版物中提取结构化数值数据；在 1,464 个数据点上达到 88% 的准确率，自动化了先前的人工研究流程。
为多伦多大学的城市数字孪生项目开发了交互式 React 仪表盘，通过 SPARQL 集成 GraphDB，可通过基于地图的指标和多维图表可视化分层的城市数据，从而促进“完整社区”分析并支持数据驱动的城市规划。

bullets_en: Engineered sophisticated system prompts and few-shot learning templates for the Xinghuo LLM, optimizing performance for financial Q&A, dialogue summarization, and multi-intent recognition tasks.

Conducted technical feasibility studies on state-of-the-art AI Agent frameworks (e.g., AutoGPT, ReAct); prototyped agentic workflows to evaluate their integration into existing enterprise-level production environments.

Developed an end-to-end automation framework for generating Financial Due Diligence reports, integrating web-scraping for article collection, LLM-driven content generation, and automated format validation to reduce manual reporting time.
bullets_zh: 为星火大模型（Xinghuo LLM）设计复杂的系统提示和少量示例学习模板，优化其在金融问答、对话摘要和多意图识别任务中的表现。
对最先进的 AI Agent 框架（如 AutoGPT、ReAct）进行了技术可行性研究；原型化了 agentic 工作流以评估其在企业级生产环境中的集成潜力。
开发了一个用于生成财务尽职调查报告的端到端自动化框架，集成网页抓取、LLM 驱动的内容生成和自动格式验证，以减少人工报告时间。

title_en: Research Assistant - Applied Machine Learning and Federated Learning
title_zh: 研究助理 - 应用机器学习与联邦学习
bullets_en: Optimized deep learning architectures for the MedFM Medical Image Classification Challenge, achieving 80% accuracy on multi-domain medical datasets through advanced data curation and model fine-tuning.

Developed a Byzantine-robust Federated Learning aggregation strategy to mitigate poisoning attacks by implementing a dynamic weighting mechanism that identifies malicious clients via analysis of current and historical update trajectories.

Evaluated FL vulnerabilities by engineering an adversarial attack framework that simulates sophisticated poisoning (mimicking benign client behaviour), degrading global model accuracy by ~5% in experiments.
bullets_zh: 优化用于 MedFM 医学图像分类挑战的深度学习架构，通过高级数据整理与模型微调，在多域医学数据集上达到 80% 的准确率。
开发了一种拜占庭鲁棒的联邦学习聚合策略，通过分析当前与历史更新轨迹识别恶意客户端，从而减轻投毒攻击影响。
通过工程化一个对抗性攻击框架评估联邦学习脆弱性，该框架模拟复杂的投毒行为（模仿良性客户端行为），在实验中使全局模型准确率下降约 5%。

bullets_en: Architected an automated evaluation pipeline to trigger LLM inference on large-scale datasets and programmatically benchmark outputs against ground-truth labels, streamlining the model validation lifecycle through automated performance analytics and Excel reporting.

Engineered a multi-tier dashboard (Frontend & Backend) enabling regional managers to query delivery worker compliance; implemented a hierarchical data-fetching API and complex filtering logic to manage provincial and city-level data granularity.

Architected an integrated automation suite using Selenium and Pytest to conduct end-to-end (E2E) testing across frontend and backend APIs; validated 300+ functional points and achieved 90% code coverage across unit and integration test suites to ensure system-wide stability.
bullets_zh: 设计自动化评估管道以在大规模数据集上触发 LLM 推理，并以编程方式将输出与真实标签进行基准比较，通过自动化性能分析与 Excel 报告简化模型验证流程。
构建多层仪表盘（前后端），使地区经理能够查询配送员合规情况；实现分层数据获取 API 与复杂过滤逻辑以管理省/市级的数据粒度。
架构集成自动化套件（Selenium 与 Pytest），对前后端 API 执行端到端测试；验证 300+ 个功能点并在单元与集成测试中达到 90% 的覆盖率，以确保系统稳定性。

bullets_en: Mentored engineering students in core software construction principles, focusing on Object-Oriented Design (OOD), architectural patterns, and Java-based system development within a rigorous 5-credit curriculum.

Led instructional sessions on complex CS topics, including Abstract Data Types (ADTs), Design Patterns (Factory, Singleton, Strategy), and Concurrency, emphasizing thread safety and memory management.

Conducted intensive code reviews for student projects, identifying logical bottlenecks and guiding the implementation of scalable, maintainable, and testable code through industry-standard best practices.
bullets_zh: 指导工程学生掌握软件构建的核心原则，重点关注面向对象设计（OOD）、架构模式与基于 Java 的系统开发，作为严格的 5 学分课程的一部分。
主持关于抽象数据类型（ADTs）、设计模式（工厂、单例、策略）与并发性的专题教学，强调线程安全与内存管理。
对学生项目进行深入代码审查，识别逻辑瓶颈并指导实施可扩展、可维护且可测试的代码，遵循行业最佳实践。
